content: It'd be like looking for a needle in a burning haystack. Oh, I've done that, Mark said airily. It's a game we used to play, after we got rid of all our livestock and didn't need our hay no more. You throw a match into the haystack, give the fire a three-second head start, and begin looking. You can find the needle every time if you work quick.
author: Margaret Peterson Haddix
